so_58894982: How to generate a random string in a specific range (bash)
so_59038617: Creating a custom random variable
Top-3 Scripts:
so_58894982: #! /bin/bash

symbols='0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIGKLMNOPQRSTUVYXWZ~#$&_+-=/\'  # Stupid SO: '
count_symbols=${#symbols}
(( length = RANDOM % 6 + 10 ))
password=""
for i in $(seq 1 $length) ; do
    password+=${symbols:RANDOM % count_symbols:1}
done
echo "$password"

so_59038617: function RANDOM(){
    rando=$( head -100 /dev/urandom | tr -dc a-zA-Z0-9 | fold -w ${1:-15} | head -1 )
    echo $rando
}

RANDOM
RANDOM 4
RANDOM 40
